title: ContextVariation
description: A distinct test type or environmental context under which a coverage target may be invoked, used to parameterize test design across different execution conditions (functional correctness, load behavior, security posture, regression state). Maps to environmental needs documented in IEEE 829-2008 test design specifications.

contextType.description: The category of test context this variation represents

environmentFactors.description: References EnvironmentFactor nodes specifying the concrete environmental constraints (OS, locale, network, hardware, dependency versions) that define this context variation.
